entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
